Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /auth/login
2. Enter valid admin email and password.
3. Click Login.
Expected Results: Redirected to /admin/dashboard. URL changes to /admin/dashboard.

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /auth/login.
2. Enter valid student email and password.
3. Click Login.
Expected Results: Redirected to /dashboard. URL changes to /dashboard.

Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email.
2. Enter incorrect password.
3. Click Login.
Expected Results: Error message "Invalid credentials" displayed. User remains on login page.

Test Steps:
1. Click "Request Access" on login page.
2. Fill Name, Email, Password, Message.
3. Click Submit.
Expected Results: Success message displayed. User redirected to login. Request appears in Admin > Access Requests.

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /admin/dashboard.
2. Observe Stat Cards (Students, Exams, Attempts).
Expected Results: Stats are visible and non-zero (if data exists). Charts load correctly.

Test Steps:
1. Click History (Clock icon) in header.
2. Verify recent actions are listed.
Expected Results: Side sheet opens. Recent actions (e.g., Login, Exam Create) are listed with timestamps.

Test Steps:
1. Go to /admin/exams.
2. Click Create Exam.
3. Enter Title, Duration (60), Pass% (40).
4. Click Create.
Expected Results: Exam created in "Draft" state. Redirected to Exam Details page.

Test Steps:
1. In Exam Details, scroll to Questions.
2. Enter Question Text, Marks.
3. Add Options (mark one as Correct).
4. Click Add Question.
Expected Results: Question appears in the list below. Marks updated.

Test Steps: Students exist
Expected Results:
1. Click "Select Students".
2. Check boxes for specific students.
3. Save.
Status: Selected students appear in "Assigned Students" list.

Test Steps:
1. Click Edit icon.
2. Toggle "Active" to ON.
3. Save.
Expected Results: Exam status badge changes to "Active". Visible on Student Dashboard.

Test Steps: 1. In Exam Details, toggle "Declare Results".
Expected Results: Toast "Results Published" appears. Toggle state persists.

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /dashboard.
2. Check "Active Exams" tab.
Expected Results: Assigned active exams are listed. Cards show "Start Exam" or "Open on [Date]".

Test Steps:
1. Click "Start Exam".
2. Click "I am ready to begin".
Expected Results: Exam Player loads. First question displayed. Timer starts.

Test Steps:
1. Select an option for Q1.
2. Click Next.
Expected Results: Selection persists. Q2 is displayed.

Test Steps: 1. Click "Mark for Review" on current question.
Expected Results: Question number in palette turns purple/distinct color.

Test Steps:
1. Switch browser tab or minimize window.
2. Return to exam.
Expected Results: Warning modal appears ("Tab switch detected"). Count increases.

Test Steps: 1. Trigger tab switch limit (e.g. 3 times).
Expected Results: Exam auto-submits. Redirected to completion screen.

Test Steps:
1. Click "Finish Exam".
2. Confirm submission.
Expected Results: Exam submitted. Redirected to Dashboard. Status "Completed".

Test Steps:
1. Student Dashboard.
2. Locate completed exam.
3. Click "View Results".
Expected Results: Detailed scorecard opens. Marks, Percentage, and Pass/Fail status shown.

Test Steps:
1. Student Dashboard.
2. Locate completed exam.
Expected Results: Button says "Results hidden by admin". Unable to view scorecard.

Test Steps:
1. Admin > Results > [Exam Name].
2. Find student in list.
Expected Results: Student score, status (Pass/Fail) displayed correctly.

Test Steps:
1. Admin > Results > [Exam Name].
2. Click "Export CSV".
Expected Results: CSV file downloaded with columns: Name, Email, Score, Status, Date.

Test Steps:
1. Open App on Mobile View (DevTools).
2. Check Navbar, Exam Player, Dashboard.
Expected Results: Layout adjusts. No horizontal scroll on essential elements. Buttons clickable.
